name: Dam Busters
overview: A game in which you have to bomb a damn by pressing the space bar. However, you have to watch out for anti-aircraft fire (which cannot be avoided) as well. The game is more based on timing your shots. You have three planes to do the job Part of a complimentary cassette you got in Canada if you purchased your VIC-20 (along with the cassette deck), or just the deck alone from Canadian Tire
